title: As a User, I want the Roster limits to expand on the Roster Expansion date
custom_steps:
When the system reaches the Roster Expansion date
(to repro, backdate Roster Expansion date to yesterday and/or today)
custom_expected:
THEN Roster limits will update
- Roster limit (26 to 28)
- Pitcher limit (13 to 14) 
*this is configurable in the EBIS Constants tab but these are the current numbers actually used*

title: As a system admin, I want the Ebis constants screen to display a roster limit section
custom_preconds: The new ebis constants page will have an additional accordion above the actual constants titled “Roster Limits”
custom_steps: WHEN viewing the EBIS Constants page
custom_expected:
THEN The new ebis constants page will have an additional accordion above the actual constants titled “Roster Limits”
AND The new section will have the following values:
- Major League active upper limit (pre roster expansion)
- Major League active upper limit (post roster expansion)
- Major League active lower limit (pre roster expansion)
- Major League active lower limit (post roster expansion)
- Major League pitcher limit (pre roster expansion)
- Major League pitcher limit (post roster expansion)
- Domestic reserve count limit (in season)
- Domestic reserve count limit (off season)
AND Pitcher limit will be removed from the system values page
AND all roster count limit checks will be updated to use these new values

title: As a User, I want to see warnings if I Submit a transaction that will put me over the pitcher limit
custom_steps: WHEN a user submits a transaction that would put the club over the pitcher limit
custom_expected:
Then the system will return a warning (overrideable for club and BOC)
AND The warning will also be included on the two-way player widget

title: As a User, I want to see warnings if I approve a transaction that will put me over the pitcher limit
custom_steps: WHEN a user Approves a transaction that would put the club over the pitcher limit
custom_expected:
Then the system will return a warning (overrideable for BOC)
AND The warning will also be included on the two-way player widget

title: As a User, I want to see the color change for going over the Pitcher Limit
custom_steps: WHEN a transaction is Approved that puts the ORG over the pitcher limit
custom_expected:
THEN the the Pitcher limit text color on the Roster widget (Mj/MN roster tab) will turn Red
AND if transaction is reversed or reversed/suppressed, color will go back to black

title: As a User, I want to see the color change from Red to Black when going back under the Pitcher Limit
custom_steps: WHEN a transaction is approved that puts the ORG back or under the pitcher limit,
custom_expected: THEN the Pitcher Limit text color will display black

title: As a User, I want new max Roster Limits for September
custom_steps: WHEN the system reaches the Roster Expansion Date
custom_expected:
THEN a new September Max of 28 will be created
AND From the Roster Expansion Date (system date) through the end of the season, the max active roster limit for MJ Rosters will be 28
AND The Under Control limit will remain 40
AND If the Active Count exceeds 28, the number will turn red on the roster summary screens
AND The Roster notification batch will be updated to create notifications if active roster counts are anything other than 28 during September
AND Any rule checks that check against MJ roster limits will be updated to account for the new limits

title: As a User, I want Pitcher Limits added to MJ Rosters
custom_steps: WHEN the system reaches the Roster Expansion date (configurable in System Dates tab)
custom_expected:
THEN From Opening Day to the day before the roster expansion date, the maximum number of pitchers allowed on a MJ Active Roster is 13
AND From the roster expansion date to the end of the season, the maximum number of pitchers allowed on a MJ Active Roster is 14
AND These values should be easily configurable on the ebis constants screen
- Active MJ roster pitcher limit pre expansion
- Active MJ roster pitcher limit post expansion
AND The pitcher count on the Roster Summary screen should turn Red if the number of pitchers on the Active MJ roster is greater than the applicable number
AND The Roster notification batch should be updated to generate notifications if a club has more than the allowable number of pitchers
AND Two-Way player count as position players

title: On Submit, Sign Free Agent to ML Roster transaction uses expanded roster number when checking roster limits
custom_steps:
When User Submits  a Sign to Free Agent transaction
AND the ORG is at the expanded roster limit
custom_expected:
THEN a warning will display 
The club {name} will exceed the Active List or Under Control limit.
Active Limit: {limit) Actual: {actual} Under Control Limit: 40 Actual: 40

title: Notifications generated by the Roster Management Batch check against expanded roster count when determining if teams are violating their count
custom_steps:
WHEN an ORG is past the expansion limit
AND the Roster Management batch is ran
custom_expected:
THEN a notification will display
- {ORG} has violated the active limit. Limit: 28 Actual: {actual}

custom_expected:
